attributes.action: Keep open the Royal Hospital Haslar.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The hospital continues to provide vauable medical treatment to Service and ex-Service personnel as well as the the locel population in the Gosport area and beyond - all who will suffer a great loss if it is closed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
